... operation, aimed at finally capturing the Black Widow suspect after a six month trail of embezzlement and fraud, once again failed to snare its subject.

The auditorium is packed with the Blue Bay High student b natural order is clear, the pastel flock at the front, th headed jocks in the center, and the rejects at the back. Marie is amongst her sweater monkey friends, but she's st shocked by what happened out in the parking lot...
(handing over a present) Happy birthday, babe. They ain't diamonds, but you're just gonna have to wait for those...

Marie and Elena make brief, electric eye contact, across of hormonally challenged students as Principal LIONEL MOS ill-fitting sports jacket coffee-stained, steps onstage.
We're here today to address a growing epidemic that affects all of you.
He pauses, waits for the student body to quiet down...
National studies report sexual activity among students at an all-time high.
The students all cheer, naturally.
We'll see who's cheering when you've got an unwanted pregnancy on your hands, or get slapped with a paternity suit...Or arrested for date rape. But don't take my word for it...
He motions behind him to KRISTEN RICHARDS, early 30's, a beauty who's doing her best to hide behind a bland gray s glasses, and CHAD BORMAN, late 20s, devilishly handsome..
Miss Richards and Dr. Borman are here to tell you about the pitfalls first hand...
Kristen steps up to the lectern.
Good morning, my name is Kristen Richards. I'm an officer for the Miami juvenile parole board, as some of you already know...
Quick glance at Elena who rolls her eyes...

But that's not what brings me here today. When I heard about Principal Mosster's sex education program I thought I'd volunteer my own personal story, in hopes that you might learn from the mistakes I made. Back in High school all I wanted to do was get drunk, stoned and laid...
The students roar their approval.
By my junior year, my life was a blur of cheap beer, anonymous sex, partying every night of the week...
Elena covers her mouth, as if to cough...
(through fake coughs) ...whore...

And then, one night at some pathetic frat party, someone slipped a roofie in my drink...and raped me.
This quiets the auditorium.

There isn't a day goes by my skin doesn't crawl when I think of the violation and humiliation I endured. I can promise you that if you make the same kind of wrong- headed choices I did, you'll be seeing Dr. Borman...
Chad steps to the podium.

Thank you, Miss Richards. My name's Dr. Chad Borman. I run the forensics lab at the police department, where my work has helped convict hundreds of sex offenders. Most teens like Ms. Richards never get their lives together. The physical scars may go away, but the emotional damage stays forever.

While Chad drones on, MUDDY, a Gremlin-eyed drooler, sitt front of Elena, looks back at her shapely legs as she put on the back of the chair. He spots the ugly plastic brace locked around one of her ankles.
That's not...what I think it is, is it?
Whattchya think it is, bitch?
The words catch in his throat.
One of them...Parole leashes...
Bingo.
So you can't, like, go more than ten miles from the cop shop?
Elena taps the flashing red light on the plastic bracelet
Five. I got someone's panties in a bunch.
Back at the podium, Chad leans forward, making sure his w resonate with the student body.
And as for the perpetrators of this heinous act, even if you are still a minor, you will be tried as an adult, and, if convicted, you will do hard time.
He pauses to let the impact of this wash over the student
Are there any questions?
(calling out) Yeah, I got one for Miss Richards.
Ask away.
When they found the scumbag who took your precious flower of virginity, you sued his sorry ass, right?
Kristen is taken aback by Elena's insensitivity, stumbles words, finally spitting out the sad, sorry truth...
Uh, no, actually, I was never able to make a positive ID. All I remember was his alcohol-soaked breath whispering in my ear, "You won't remember, but you'll never forget..."
Elena cracks a sideways grin...
So what you're really saying is you fucked for free...
Kristen has no answer to that. Principal Mosster does his control the situation...
Miss Sandoval. You're on thin ice, young lady!
Like Elena cares.   She leans back, nods. Job done.
The bright Florida sunshine washes down on packed bleache side of the massive diving pool, where a diving meet is i swing...

Breathtaking beauties from teams all over the region, in school colored bikinis, are scattered around the pool are But all eyes are on the home team. Masturbatory fantasies as the Blue Bay Girls' Diving Team runs through stretches And as exquisite as these girls are, they pale in compari absolutely sweet Marie, stunning in her nearly see-throug bathing suit.

The crowd cheers, watching Marie edge out to the diving p twenty feet above. Jenny right behind, waits on the ladde JAY CLIFFORD, Marie's chisel-jawed stepfather in his late thirties, focuses a DIGITAL VIDEO CAMERA on Marie from th row of the bleachers...
C'mon now baby, you can do it...

Marie looks at her stepfather, nods tentatively, but then the incongruous figure of Elena, sidling up to him...
(to Marie) Just try to keep those legs together.

Whoa. Jay's lost for words as he diverts his attention to platform where Marie stands perfectly still before steppi the air. Nice take off, gotta work on the landing...

No such word as 'can't. Now do it again. Only better...
Marie takes a deep breath, approaches the ladder once mor she's about to start the arduous climb, Elena hands her a
Bet you choke.
Stops Marie in her tracks.
What's your major malfunction?
Just wanted to make a wager. Between best friends.
Marie just starts to climb the ladder to the high dive pl
You blow this dive, I get those diamonds of yours.

How'd you know about my inheritance?
Talk of the town, birthday girl. Today's the day, right?
And what, pray tell, are you willing to wager when I win?
Elena thinks for a second, glances back at Jay with a big
I'll stay away from your stepfather. You make it, I won't be your new stepmom anytime soon. Whattya say?

Take your sorry ass back to the swamps.

Choke!

Marie clambers up onto the high dive platform, tries to f the task at hand. But can't help but notice her nemesis b walking slowly, seductively, up to Jay, intoxicating him. Marie blocks out the distraction, concentrates at the tas hand, stepping to the edge of the platform and the 20 foo looming beyond... She slides a ring off her finger, kisses it for luck. It' design. Four curved gold ridges, just ready to hold a Dia She throws the ring into the pool ahead of her, the gold in the afternoon sunlight as it drops into the water, and second before it breaks the surface, Marie is airborne...

She twists magnificently through the air, a sight of brea beauty. Thank God this is in slow motion. And as she gets ever closer to the water's surface, she t does one last back flip, straightening out at the last po instant, slicing through the water with nary a splash. Marie surfaces to roaring APPLAUSE. Treading water, she c but watch her Jay's smiling face in the bleachers...

Sickeningly expensive POWERBOATS and de-rigged SCHOONERS inlet leading to the verdant lawns of the Clifford Mansio Banners and streamers wishing Marie a happy birthday deco grounds. Partygoers soak in the blazing Florida sun, sip alcoholic punch, and stare out gratefully across the thin of water that separates them from the riff-raff on the ma Marie sits away from it all, lost in thought, as Jenny, i and a bikini top, sidles up beside her.
What's the matter, sweetie, pissed that one judge only gave you a 9.7?

Nah. I'm cool.
Denial ain't just a river in Egypt, babe. You got diamonds on the mind.
Have either of you seen my video camera?
Marie looks round to her stepfather, shakes her head, bri bemused look to Jay's face.
I had it at the dive meet, I'm sure...
He shrugs, picks up a crystal glass, hits a fork sharply it, drawing the attention of the assembled partygoers...
Ladies, Gentlemen, friends, raise a glass to Marie, on her eighteenth birthday.
Everyone raises their fine crystal.
She's become every inch of the woman her Mother hoped she'd be. Wherever she is now, Julie's looking down and smiling.
Tears well in Marie's eyes...
And that's why, on your eighteenth birthday, Marie, I know your mother wanted you to have...
He notices, out of the corner of his eyes, two well-dress standing at the entrance to his house. Whoever they are, instantly unnerved. He stumbles over his words...
... she wanted you to have... a wonderful birthday party surrounded by all your friends.
e glances back toward the house, watching the two men ent
Please excuse me.
... and hurries after them.   Marie is left dumbfounded. but so far...

She chases after him...
Marie makes her way down the sleek white corridors inside opulent Clifford Mansion, past framed family photos, of J and the late Julie...
Jay?
e's nowhere to be found. Frustrated, Marie finds herself the kitchen. She angrily selects a bottle of Champagne, p cork. Before she can swig any alcohol she hears raised vo

Marie sidles up to the door jam, peaks through the crack. sees makes the blood run cold in her veins... An imposing Cuban businessman, MR. BARAJAS, stands threat over a visibly frightened Jay. Barajas nods to Cicatriz, who moves in on Jay with lightn quickness, holds a Razor sharp KNIFE against his thumb.

And with that the Cuban men head to the door. Marie scram away, her heart pounding... She's halfway down the hallway when Mr. Barajas and Cicat Jay's study. She turns, tries to look innocent as the Cub 'businessmen' stare her down.
ay appears in the doorway, sweat cascading from his brow.
Marie! Shouldn't you be with your friends?
I was just...

Make me...

And that's it. Marie lashes out with a haymaker punch. Co Elena's jaw and she goes reeling back. But it's ignited t fighter in her, and she comes roaring back into the fray, into Marie and together they tumble to the ground...

he crowds gather to watch the cat-fight, in equal parts a and aroused. It's a hair pulling, teeth gnashing, make up wrestling match, no holds barred. The drunken Marie has t hand, the alcohol fueling her rage.

A perfect rainbow is trapped inside the two flawless Moth Daughter DIAMONDS, glinting in the morning sun. Marie can barely contain her excitement as she paces fran in the dark marble museum hall, reaching out a trembling towards the glass case containing the priceless jewels...

Jay. Marie. Mr. Bloom...

heo intervenes...

When a door down the hall opens she looks up expectantly, see Kristen come out, walk towards her, followed by someo Marie's view is blocked by Kristen until the Parole Offic her and reveals...Elena.

A look somewhere between horror and shock is etched on Ma beautiful face. Elena just smiles, blows her a kiss.

Jay sits at the defendant's table, suit impeccable, hair immaculate, game face on. Theo sits beside him, scribblin Marie is in the front row of the gallery, surrounded by h coiffured peers. She tries to smile stoically at Jay... Kristen sits beside Elena at the prosecution table.
had is on the stand as ARLO MEESE, 35, the slick District Attorney, steps forward.
